name: Verloren (Fortunastreet) (Fortunastreet)
description:
Synopsis: 

Angel is an ordinary student, studying at an ordinary magic college, having ordinary dreams, and going through an ordinary day. Well, as ordinary as the day of the biennial competition organised by her college can be. And as long as no one interferes with the programme...

Verloren is a J-RPG made out of passion for the genre, with a slower narration reminiscent of a visual novel and strategic (also unforgiving in the highest difficulties) battles. The whole thing is sprinkled with twisted puzzles and mini-games.

Key features of the game: 

-12 hours of gameplay, 20 with all the side content
-Extensive CTB (Conditional Turn Battle) combat system
-Bosses that will require you to use your cunning
-6 difficulty levels
-A bar for the random encounters, which can be turned off at will
-Lots of skills to learn
-Bonus dungeons and quests
-Tons of secrets to unearth, with an achievement system to reference them
-Lots of mini-games

Installation:

-Extract the archive, then run the Game.exe file.
-The controls are shown in the three dedicated images.
-You can read the file Walkthrough.docx if you feel stuck.
-The game credits are in the $Credits folder.

Important notes:

-The linux build is fully functional. To run the game on this platform, run the nw file (with a simple ./nw).
-A mac build will be coming at some point
